name: Heathen's Forge
description:
Fast paced slasher in the dark world of steampunk fantasy.
Use the environment and combine your abilities.
Turn the weapons of opponents against themselves.
To survive, you have to adapt to each type of enemy and change your strategy on the fly.

Gamepad is highly recommended!

If you don't have gamepad, controls are: [wasd], [space], [1], [2], [lmb/rmb]
